plaintext:
Start your favorite activity.
Some may say that they don't have an activity they like.
But before I say'nothing'
If I go back to my past, everyone lives
What I did while having fun, the activity that I felt joyful about doing this
I think I have one.

In my case, I can sing, read a book, play the guitar, talk to me, watch a movie,
etc.
If possible, rather than end with'watching a movie'
How to make it mine after watching a movie
By keeping a short diary about watching a movie or'review'
It's a good idea to create a story.

It is because such stories gather to create my emotions, my personality, and my
story. ^^

 1. Write down what you like about yourself

Write 10 things you like about the things that make up you.
It can be your appearance, your personality, your ability.
It doesn't matter if it's very trivial.
'The fingers are long and thin'
'I feel good about laughing', etc.

If you think you don’t have anything you like because of your low self-esteem
Ask a friend or family member who cares about you.
Then write it down instead of'denying' it.
If you look at it every day and try to acknowledge your strengths,
At some point you'll start to see things that you like.

 1. Keep away or ignore self-esteem vampires

Self-esteem vampires are people who lower my self-esteem and hurt self-esteem.

Ordinary people easily say things that hurt
They say,'It's all telling you to do well.'
No matter how much you think of me, my energy
If I can’t accept that, so if it acts as a negative energy for me
It can never be a good story.

If even the best gift in the world doesn’t suit the recipient,
It's not a great gift, it's just useless.

In the name of family, in the name of friends
The people who hurt me are tied to the'relationship' of family or friends
If left unattended, you can make yourself more atrophied.

I think the story they are telling
If it negatively affects me, it's good to take a short distance.
It is like minimizing the time to bump into, or having fewer meetings.

People who thought they were family,
To stay away from close friends who thought there was only one
It won't be easy.

But if they really are for me
I will try to hear my story, why I want to distance them from them.
If not, you don't have to be disappointed.

When it comes to affecting self-esteem,'relationships' really play a big part.
It's because people hurt the most.
Here's how to make yourself stronger.

 1. Making a person who sees my strengths

The wounds received as a self-esteem vampire are due to relationships with good
people
It can be healed. But people with low self-esteem
Determining whether this person is really for me because of a wound or a lack
It can be difficult.

So you have to be more careful, but nevertheless
If you look around well, you will see my strengths that will hold my hand
There are many people who have a positive influence.

Yesterday, an impressive article appeared.
It was an article titled'Because I'm so hard, but will you hug me only once?'
A girl in her school uniform said to the person sitting next to her,
Most people hug and comfort students
They bought me a drink or something to eat.
Watch what you do well
If you are looking for someone who motivates you to grow and develop in a good
direction
I think it will be a good influence on me and my life.

 1. Praise yourself in the mirror once a day

Do you like to look in the mirror?
I don't like it, but I don't like it.

Mirrors are a great tool to positively consciousize your image.
Of course, you can also become conscious negatively.

What do you see first in the mirror?
The person who sees the complex first, the person who sees the most fleshy part
first
Please change your gaze and praise your external part.

It doesn't look shiny, but it's thick, so it's nice.
It’s the right size, so it’s very trivial to wear shoes.
It can be an important compliment.

Of course, it is also important to recognize the complex as it is.
If you have a lot of belly fat, consider it only as a fact that you have'too
much belly fat'.
After that, don't come to a conclusion like'I'm ugly, I'm fat'. Hahaha

Because the brain creates my image by stacking up what I think
At some point, even though I wasn't really ugly and fat
The moment will come when you recognize yourself that way.

Remember, the habit of being positively conscious of yourself increases your
self-esteem.

 * Leads to 10 ways to restore self-esteem (bottom). ^^ *
   https://brunch.co.kr/@ansyd/39
   10 ways to restore self-esteem (bottom)
   10 ways to restore self-esteem, organized by Style Coach (bottom)
 * This is a continuation of the 10 ways to restore self-esteem (top). ^^ *
   https://brunch.co.kr/@ansyd/38
 * Getting in the habit of accepting praise

It’s the sixth time now. This takes a lot of effort.
Did you do it with 7 things? ㅎㅎㅎ;;

I've been taught that it is humility to refuse praise.
But even rejection is modest.
I see that most of the people in our country
I couldn't take it well and I couldn't even say'praise' well.

A society that is stingy with'praise'
Sometimes I think I'm proud.
But it seems that sometimes it takes skill to accept praise.
It really depends on what kind of situation, what kind of target, what kind of
context it is.

Nevertheless, the praise that comes to me
'Thank you.' Or, naturally, passing it over as a compliment
Habits support self-affirmation.

No matter how much you praise, people who cannot accept themselves
Expectations of yourself are so great that accepting them
It may be unacceptable.
'I'm still far away.' The thought of'I'm too shy to be praised like this'
It could be because you listened too hard.
But when the other person sees it, I want to praise him
Rather than refusing that part with my will
Wouldn't it be better to accept lightly with'thank you' for positive
development? ^^

 1. Learn confident styling/makeup/hair

This also has to do with what I do.
Balance is important in everything.

Decorating your appearance doesn't mean you've been neglected inside.
It is important for my self-esteem to take care of the outside with the inside.

Finding the style that suits you, finding makeup,
Hair that will make me confident
When you look in the mirror, it has the effect that you like yourself more.

By finding the image I was hoping for
Confidence increases with self-esteem.

However, the important thing is that it must be an external self-esteem
accompanied by inner strength.
After removing colorful makeup, I feel shabby
Anyone who can’t go outside
It is enough to take care of your appearance, but lack the attitude of
self-recognition.

Styling, makeup, and hair
These are the tools you can use to become the better me, the one you want,
It shouldn't be a tool to cover me.
By acknowledging myself and putting on the appropriate wrapping paper
Don't forget that I can shine more. ^^

 1. Learn to comfort yourself by patting yourself

Find a friend when you need comfort
Consultation
